title: Letter Matching Game
description: An interactive game where kindergarten students match uppercase letters to their lowercase partners to build letter recognition skills.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Reading
Letter Recognition
Phonics

learningObjectives: Recognize all 26 letters of the alphabet (uppercase and lowercase)
Match uppercase letters to their lowercase counterparts
Build visual discrimination skills for letter forms

controls.name: New Game
controls.description: Starts a new game with shuffled letter cards

controls.name: Pairs
controls.description: Adjusts the number of letter pairs to match (4-8)

simulation.assumptions: Uses first 8 letters of alphabet (A-H) for manageable game size

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of letter matching game
Explore letter matching game through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of letter matching game to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on letter matching game
